short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome browser plug-in based on fofa to make it easy for users to quickly find information about the site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Fofa Search plugin for Chrome automatically checks whether Shodan has any information for the current website. Is the website also running FTP, DNS, SSH or some unusual service? With this plugin you can see all the info that Shodan has collected on a given website/ domain.
